00019 #include "FileHeaderWriter.h"
00020 #include "GenericDataHeaderWriter.h"
00021 #include "FileOutput.h"
00022 #include "AffymetrixGuid.h"
00023 
00024 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_io;
00025 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_utilities;
00026 
00027 void FileHeaderWriter::Write(std::ofstream &os, FileHeader &g)
00028 {
00029     WriteMagicNumber(os, g);
00030     WriteVersion(os, g);
00031     WriteDataGroupCnt(os, g);
00032     WriteDataGroupOffset(os, 0);
00033     WriteGenericDataHdr(os, g);
00034 }
00035 
00036 void FileHeaderWriter::WriteMagicNumber(std::ofstream &os, FileHeader &g)
00037 {
00038         FileOutput::WriteInt8(os, g.GetMagicNumber());
00039 }
00040 
00041 void FileHeaderWriter::WriteVersion(std::ofstream &os, FileHeader &g)
00042 {
00043         FileOutput::WriteInt8(os, g.GetVersion());
00044 }
00045 
00046 void FileHeaderWriter::WriteDataGroupCnt(std::ofstream &os, FileHeader &g)
00047 {
00048         FileOutput::WriteInt32(os, g.GetDataGroupCnt());
00049 }
00050 
00051 void FileHeaderWriter::WriteDataGroupOffset(std::ofstream &os, u_int32_t offset)
00052 {
00053     dataSetOffsetPos = os.tellp();
00054     FileOutput::WriteUInt32(os, offset);
00055 }
00056 
00057 void FileHeaderWriter::UpdateDataGroupOffset(std::ofstream &os, u_int32_t offset) const
00058 {
00059     if(dataSetOffsetPos > 0) 
00060     {
00061         os.seekp(dataSetOffsetPos, std::ios::beg);
00062         FileOutput::WriteUInt32(os, offset);
00063         os.seekp(offset, std::ios::beg);
00064     }
00065 }
00066 
00067 void FileHeaderWriter::WriteGenericDataHdr(std::ofstream &os, FileHeader &g)
00068 {
00069     GenericDataHeaderWriter writer;
00070 
00071                 // Check if a file ID has been assign, if not assign one.
00072                 if (g.GetGenericDataHdr()->GetFileId().length() == 0)
00073                         g.GetGenericDataHdr()->SetFileId(AffymetrixGuid::GenerateNewGuid());
00074 
00075     writer.Write(os, *(g.GetGenericDataHdr()));
00076 }
